rooms.description: A minimalist entrance with a foyer that provides a welcoming entry. Features a coat closet and storage area for outdoor gear.
Spacious living room with clean lines, natural lighting, and minimalistic furniture. Vastu-compliant placement ensuring good energy flow.
Integrated dining space adjacent to the living room for a seamless open concept, fostering social interactions.
Modern kitchen with efficient layout and minimalistic cabinetry. Placed in an appropriate zone per Vastu to harness positive energy, with natural ventilation.
Luxurious master suite featuring an en-suite bathroom, walk-in closet, and ample storage. Designed for privacy and restful energy according to Vastu.
Additional bedroom for guests ensuring comfort, adhering to minimalist design principles with subtle decorative elements.
Functional servant area with a small kitchenette and bathroom. Kept minimal yet comfortable, ensuring compliance with local norms.

openings.description: Large windows placed strategically to maximize natural light and ventilation. West-facing windows designed for passive cooling in accordance with Vastu.
Minimalist, frameless glass doors connecting main living spaces ensuring fluid movement across the open floor plan.
